body: Permitted Road-Based Transportation Providers       A commercial business permit is required to guide trips in Yellowstone National Park. The table below lists transportation businesses that have permits to operate in Yellowstone National Park.      A Alltrans — (307) 733-4325 Amazing Taxi — (406) 223-5344 AVR Ventures, LLC — (307) 690-6106   B Back Country Sports — (208) 652-3385 or (208) 680-3385 Backcountry Safaris, LLC — (307) 413-9300 Big Sky Shuttle—866-661-6836 BrushBuck Guide Services, Inc. — (888) 282-5868 Buffalo Bus Touring Company — (800) 426-7669 Buffalo Roam Park Tours — (307) 413-0954   C Canyon Teton, LLC — (307) 734-7333   E   Earth Tours –Yellowstone National Park Tours — (307) 733-4261 Easy Tours, LLC — (406) 640-0026 Environmental Adventure Company — (406) 222-5660   F Field Guides, Inc. — (800) 728-4953 Flying Pig Adventure Company, LLC — (406) 848-7510 Four Seasons Resort and Residences Jackson Hole — (307) 732-5074   G Grand Teton Adventure Co. — (307) 734-4454 Grand Teton Tours — (307) 413.5488 Greater Yellowstone Guides — (406) 587-9080 Grizzly Country Wildlife Adventures LLC — (307) 413-4389 Grub Steak Expeditions, LLC — (307) 527-6316   J Jackson Hole EcoTour Adventures — (307) 690-9533 Jackson Hole Adv. title: Yellowstone National Park: Transportation Providers
